name: iron-plate
effect: Held: Increases the power of the holder’s Steel moves by 20%. Held by a Multitype Pokémon: Holder’s type becomes Steel.
short_effect: Held: Steel-Type moves from holder do 20% more damage. Changes Arceus’s and Judgment’s type to Steel.

flavor_text.sword_shield: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It’s a stone tablet that boosts the power of Steel-type moves.
